txt.en: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirsâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to block the goblin doors leading to the many tunnels inside Goblin-town.
You have been tasked with blocking the doors leading to the many tunnels inside Goblin-town.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The goblins of the Misty Mountains have long plagued the people of Rhovanion. A great horde of them still resides inside Goblin-town. It is imperative that we KEEP them inside the mountains, and prevent them from adding their forces to Gorgar's army. I task you with entering Goblin-town and blocking off the doors that lead to their many tunnels. I cannot ask you to face all of Goblin-town in battle by yourself, but, I bet you can cause them some trouble!'
Your mission is to block the doors leading to the many tunnels inside Goblin-town.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to the Goblin-town.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
'Well done! The goblins are no threat to us while they are trapped inside the mountain. Of course, they will eventually dig new tunnels, but you have bought us valuable time.'
Monsters in this mission will continue to join the fight until their entry-point is destroyed.
